Add Google website verification meta tag: A meta tag has been added to the HTML on the sites listed below. This step lets Google verify domain ownership on your sites.
Ongeza metatagi ya Google ya uthibitisha: Metatagi imeongezwa kwenye HTML ya tovuti zilizoorodheshwa hapa chini. Hatua hii inawezesha Google kuthibitisha umiliki wa vikoa katika tovuti zako.

Add Google website verification meta tag: Connect your Magento account to Merchant Center to begin importing your product data through the store API. After you’ve linked your Magento and Merchant Center accounts, any store information that’s updated in your Magento store will also be updated in Merchant Center.
Ongeza metatagi ya Google ya uthibitisha: Unganisha akaunti yako ya Magento kwenye Google Merchant Center ili uanze kuingiza data yako ya bidhaa kupitia API ya duka. Baada ya kuunganisha akaunti zako za Magento na Google Merchant Center, maelezo yoyote ya duka yanayosasishwa katika duka lako la Magento yatasasishwa pia katika Google Merchant Center.

Add Google website verification meta tag: Get started by clicking %s below. A new Magento API account will be automatically generated and your store information and credentials will be submitted to Merchant Center through a secure connection. If you don't already have a Merchant Center account, follow the sign up prompts to create a new account. Note: If a link is not created, your API information will be deleted after 60 days.
Ongeza metatagi ya Google ya uthibitisha: Anza kwa kubofya %s" hapa chini. Akaunti mpya ya API ya Magento itafunguliwa kiotomatiki na maelezo ya duka pamoja na kitambulisho chako cha duka zitawasilishwa kwenye Google Merchant Center kupitia muunganisho salama. Ikiwa bado huna akaunti ya Google Merchant Center
column3: fuata maelekezo ya kujisajili ili ufungue akaunti mpya. Kumbuka: Ikiwa kiungo hakijawekwa
column4: maelezo ya API yako yatafutwa baada ya siku 60."

Add Google website verification meta tag: %sGoogle Shopping%s helps businesses tap into the power of customer intent to reach the right people with relevant products ads when it matters the most. Use this extension to upload your store and product data to Google Merchant Center and make it available to Google Shopping and other Google services, allowing you to reach millions of new customers searching for what you sell.
Ongeza metatagi ya Google ya uthibitisha: %sUnunuzi kwenye Google%s husaidia biashara kunufaika na uwezo wa dhamira ya wateja ili kufikia watu mwafaka kupitia matangazo ya bidhaa muhimu wakati mwafaka zaidi. Tumia kiendelezi hiki ili kupakia data ya duka na bidhaa yako kwenye Google Merchant Center na kuiwezesha kupatikana katika Ununuzi kwenye Google na huduma nyingine za Google, ili kukuwezesha kufikia mamilioni ya wateja wapya wanaotafuta bidhaa unazouza.
